title: greentech2
author: greentech2
content: I open my Uniswap and see this CLA UNI  Uniswap-LP.org / Claim Rewards 0.3%.  Is it a scam?  How do I close this position?Thanks.

comments.author: koody
comments.body: Yes, this is a scam. Don't interact with this pool, don't sign, don't claim the rewards, just ignore.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: You should aware the original link of UNISWAP1. https://app.uniswap.org/2. https://uniswap.org/If you opened not from this site, 100% scam. Where did you get the link? email or some random message in the internet or information from someone. Please avoid any kind information from all these resource.It's better to follow some reliable site like "CMC" to get official resource link or maybe the official social media.

comments.author: greentech2
comments.body: It just pops up in my Uniswap Pool.  Maybe they send it randomly to million addresses.  I want to delete it.  How do I do that?
